description: Increase the Energy Regen of all Resonators in the team by 20% for 30 minutes. Only effective for your own characters in the multiplayer mode.
bgDescription:
This dish features raw meat stir-fried with a generous amount of Pavo Plums. It's flavorful yet not greasy, aromatic, and spicy. It's an essential, simple dish to help you get through a lengthy winter.
"Want it tasty? Just add more Pavo Plums. It has to be spicy! The spiciness is key to its flavor!"
